1: <pb/><e>Sb'it win Asaf jun tic</e> <pb/><t>A Dios 'ayc' 'a scal syamnil eb' 'ay yopiso,<f>[2]</f> xb'eyc'ojlwi 'a scal eb'.</t>
2: <t>Xyaln 'ixtc 'a eb': ¿B'a'n̈ to wal tzeyactj e coln eb' 'anma maysch'olnil tas tzb'o'o? 'In ata tzeya'ch e b'a yet' eb' maysch'olnil cha.</t>
3: <t>Colc 'el eb' may yip yet' eb' meb'a 'unn chamnc smam. Wach' tzeyutj e b'onyaj eb' cusc'ojlal yaji, yet' eb' meb'a'.</t>
4: <t>Colc 'el eb' may yip yet' eb' meb'a 'a yol sc'ab' eb' maysch'olnil snab'en cha.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Palta ax tic, matz nachj 'el eyu'uj, caw may e nab'en; 'icha to a 'a q'uic'q'uinl tzex b'eyi. C'uxn tzsatl tojlal eyu'uj.</t>
6: <pb/><t>'Ix wal 'ayex to ax tic dios ex, yujto wunnalx an Dios in tic, to Cojxn in Niwn Wel'chi.</t>
7: <t>Palta ax ticnec, 'oj e cham 'icha tz'aj scham eb' 'anma smasnil, 'icha tz'aj slajw 'el jun tzo'n̈ xo eb' yajal, 'ixta 'oj eyaji, xchi Dios.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Ach qui Diosal on̈, cotan̈ wul b'eyc'ojlej eb' 'anma cajn 'a sat lum lum tic, yujto ach 'ay ec smasnil nacion̈ 'ay 'a yolyib'n̈q'uinl tic.</t>
